page.title: 15The Weston Turville Players
page.content: There are not many forms of entertainment in Weston Turville,and people travel elsewhere for a professional show.One of the few entertainments is a group called the Weston Turville Players who put on shows in the village hall.There are serious,funny and musical shows produced.Some time ago Cinderella was shown,and more recently there was Oliver Twist.The next production is planned to be Pickwick Papers. The members of the group are ordinary people who have a job during the week but enjoy putting on the shows.Rehearsals take place on a Sunday and are very enjoyable.
